description:
Touya is stunned by Rina`s overwhelming vocals.  
Eiji as well is so impressed he says that "he has nothing else to do."
But at the same time he listens to the recording of Yuki`s "incomplete" vocals, and runs out of the studio.
Rina chases him down and talks to him about herself and Eiji, as well as Yuki`s music.
At the same time, a mentally imbalanced Haruka is wandering the streets, and is harassed by two men.  She`s saved by Mana, who happens to pass by.
Touya is spending his days working with Misaki, the work getting more and more frantic as the deadline approaches...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jikan ga Nai Toki hodo, Ooku no Koto ga Dekiru. Yatte Shimau. Mochiron, Koi datte
The Less Time You Have, the More You Can Do. The More You Do. Of Course, Love Is No Exception.
時間がない時ほど, 多くの事ができる. やってしまう. もちろん, 恋だって
